Text: Board PositionKen I am interested in a Board position with a midmarket publicly traded company I have years of solid business experience with strengths in Finance Technology and Human Resources I have served on numerous Nonprofit Boards and have an excellent track record for my work This position would also provide me the flexibility to spend some time in Washington DC to support the Bush Administration Attached is my resume Please review and provide feedback Look forward to hearing from you Will be out of the country from June Limas Jefferson Chairman CEO JEFFERSON ePeople Gemini Suite Houston Texas Office ext Fax Email Website wwwjeffersonusacom Limas Jefferson Resume with color photodoc
